basic.description: This course examines key issues and controversies that students are likely to encounter as they pursue a major in one of the social sciences. Topics vary, and look at major fields of study within the Social Sciences. Designed for students enrolled in the Social Sciences and Public Policy Living-Learning Community (SSPPLLC).
basic.subject: ISS
basic.title: Seminar in Social Science and Public Affairs

extra.enrollment_requirement: Corequisite: Students must enroll in the Social Sciences/Public Policy LLC Program.
